results.name: In binary representation: keep the first digit and rotate right the others twice.
comment: a(n) = A080542(A080542(n)); permutation of natural numbers with inverse = A080543: A080543(a(n))=a(A080543(n))=n.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
